com.interpss.dc

Interface DcNetwork

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IChildNet, NameTag, Network<DcBus,DcBranch>, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PVDcNetwork
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DcNetworkImpl, PVDcNetworkImpl

    public interface DcNetwork
extends Network<DcBus,DcBranch>
    A representation of the model object 'Dc Network'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Rated Voltage
    • Lf Converged
    See Also:
    DcSystemPackage.getDcNetwork()

    • Method Detail

      • getRatedVoltage

        double getRatedVoltage()
        Returns the value of the 'Rated Voltage' attribute.

        If the meaning of the 'Rated Voltage' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        Rated voltage for the Dc system. It is transfered to Dc Bus base voltage, when the bus is added into the net.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Rated Voltage' attribute.
        See Also:
        setRatedVoltage(double), DcSystemPackage.getDcNetwork_RatedVoltage()

      • setRatedVoltage

        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Rated Voltage' attribute.
        See Also:
        getRatedVoltage()

      • isLfConverged

        boolean isLfConverged()
        Returns the value of the 'Lf Converged' attribute. The default value is "false".

        If the meaning of the 'Lf Converged' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        loadflow convergency indicator
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Lf Converged' attribute.
        See Also:
        setLfConverged(boolean), DcSystemPackage.getDcNetwork_LfConverged()
